testcase.name: Homepage navigation and check all links
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to newsela.com Homepage "base_URL"..........................passed Given User close the announcement bar.......................................passed And User hover over to the header links one by one..........................passed Then User clicks learn more button..........................................passed And User scroll down to the bottom of the page..............................passed Then User hover over to the links one by one at the top of the page.........passed

testcase.name: Checking Team members of Newsela and find the Duplicated one
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to newsela.com Homepage "base_URL"..........................passed Given User Hover over to the Company link...................................passed Then User Clicks the Team link..............................................passed And User gets the team members name.........................................passed When Check the names for duplicated one.....................................passed Then Write the duplicated names to the 'Some Details About Newsela.com Text File' if there is..passed

testcase.name: Apply for joining newsela team

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: (//a[@target='_top'])[47]' (tried for 10 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)
